title: User will see login screen on landing page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick hrd pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em
AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user b3ta@mlb.com
AND I
custom_steps: WHEN I land on the page
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the a big blue button with either "Login to Enter" or "Click to Enter" label ![](index.php?/attachments/get/14218072)

AND I should see a hero image
AND I should see the following derby description:

"The MLB Home Run Derby Pick 'Em presented by T-Mobile

Pick the T-Mobile Home Run Derby® winners and compete to win $100,000!

Make your picks below to enter Home Run Derby Pick 'Em presented by T-Mobile and compete to win."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on the button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see a login screen

title: Logged in user will simply click and enter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick hrd pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em
AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user b3ta@mlb.com
AND I am logged into the main domain (beta-gcp.mlb.com OR mlb.com)
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the page
AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)
custom_expected:
THEN I should land on the derby page
AND I should see the url to contain "enter" at the end

title: Logged out users will have to sign in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick hrd pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em
AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user b3ta@mlb.com
AND I
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the page
AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)
AND I login with my valid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN I should land on derby pick 'em page
AND I should see the url to contain "/enter" at the end

title: Logged out users will not be able to user magic link for signing into the beta env
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick hrd pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em
AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user b3ta@mlb.com
AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page
AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)
AND I enter my valid account email address
ADN I click on link to "Verify Account With Email"
custom_expected:
THEN I should a link in my email
BUT this link should NOT work with beta env

title: Logged out users will be able to create an account for the login screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick hrd pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em
AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user b3ta@mlb.com
AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page
AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)
AND I choose to signup for an account
AND I sign up for a new account successfully
custom_expected:
THEN I should be redirected to the HRD pick 'em page
AND I should see the url contain "/enter" at the end

title: User will see a hero image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick HRD pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em

AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user [b3ta@mlb.com](mailto:b3ta@mlb.com)

AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page

AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)

AND I login with valid credentials
custom_expected: THEN I should see a hero image on top of the page

title: User will see sponsor message

GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick HRD pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em

title: User cannot pick duplicate player for each 1st, 2nd and 3rd position
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick HRD pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em

AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user [b3ta@mlb.com](mailto:b3ta@mlb.com)

AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page

AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)

AND I login with valid credentials

AND I update the url with https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em/enter?isPreview=true

AND I choose Pete Alonso for the 1st place

AND I choose Pete Alonso for the 2ND place
custom_expected: THEN I should see a validation error

title: User cannot submit without answering all required questions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick HRD pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em

AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user [b3ta@mlb.com](mailto:b3ta@mlb.com)

AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page

AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)

AND I login with valid credentials

AND I update the url with https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em/enter?isPreview=true

AND I choose Pete Alonso for the 1st place

AND I choose a different player for the 2nd place

AND I choose a different player for the 3rd place

AND I do not answer the required questions
custom_expected: THEN I should see a few validation error highlighted in light red/pink color

title: All required questions will be indicated with an *

AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user [b3ta@mlb.com](mailto:b3ta@mlb.com)

custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page

AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)

AND I login with valid credentials

AND I update the url with https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em/enter?isPreview=true

AND I choose Pete Alonso for the 1st place
custom_expected: THEN I should see see * on several questions indicating required

title: Favorite team selection is optional
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick HRD pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em

AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user [b3ta@mlb.com](mailto:b3ta@mlb.com)

AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page

AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)

AND I login with valid credentials

AND I update the url with https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em/enter?isPreview=true

AND I fill out the form with required selection without any errors

AND I do not select a favorite team (not required)
custom_expected: THEN I should be able to submit my selections (after passing captcha successfully)

title: User should not be able to submit without passing captcha check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I navigate to beta-pick HRD pick 'em page: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em

AND I authenticate with beta username and password: beta-user [b3ta@mlb.com](mailto:b3ta@mlb.com)

AND I am NOT signed into the site
custom_steps:
WHEN I land on the welcome page

AND I click on "Login to Enter" OR "Enter" button (button label may differ)

AND I login with valid credentials

AND I update the url with https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/sponsorship/home-run-derby-pick-em/enter?isPreview=true

AND I fill out the form with all required fields without any validation error

AND I do not click on captcha checkbox
custom_expected: THEN I should see a validation error on captcha
